title: Can I get my Pixel 3a to pickup Ant+ sensors?
content: I cannont get my pixel 3a to pickup any sensor that uses Ant+. I have downloaded the ant+ radio service app and the ant+ plug in off the google app store but nothing is working. For context I am trying to connect my heartrate monitor to the zwift app on my phone but it wont work. All my other sensors that broadcast in bluetooth are picked up but my heartrate only broadcasts in ant+.
